document.full_text: a review of the earthquake threat and other safety risks posed by a new york nuclear plant must be done as part of its bid to keep operating for another 20 years, new york state's attorney general said on friday.
document.title: new york state seeks risk review of nuclear plant
lines_and_colors: a review of the earthquake threat and other safety risks posed by a new york nuclear plant must be done as part of its bid to keep operating for another 20 years, new york state's attorney general said on friday.
